Package org.qi4j.functional

Functional API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Function<From,To>
    Generic function interface to map from one type to another.
    Function2<First,Second,To>
    Generic function interface to map from two parameters to a third.
    HierarchicalVisitor<NODE,LEAF,ThrowableType extends Throwable>
    Visitor to visit hierarchies.
    Specification<T>
    Generic specification interface.
    Visitable<T>
    Interface that visitable objects should implement.
    VisitableHierarchy<NODE,LEAF>
    Interface that visitable hierarchies of objects should implement.
    Visitor<T,ThrowableType extends Throwable>
    Generic Visitor interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ForEach<T>
    When using Iterables with map() and filter() the code often reads "in reverse", with the first item last in the code.
    Functions
    Utility functions.
    HierarchicalVisitorAdapter<NODE,LEAF,ThrowableType extends Throwable>
    Generic Hierarchical Visitor interface.
    Iterables
    Utility methods for working with Iterables.
    Specifications
    Common generic specification expressions
    Specifications.AndSpecification<T>
    AND Specification.
    Specifications.OrSpecification<T>
    OR Specification.
